Interface Widget

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    PagedWidget<I>
    All Known Implementing Classes:

        relative path in which package this controller can be found

      • getResponseMetadata

        String getResponseMetadata()
        Return a JSON object containing arbitrary metadata the server-side widget component wants to transmit to the client-side component as part of the current response.
        Returns:
        a string serialized JSON object or null if no metadata needs to be transmitted

      • getTile

        @Deprecated
String getTile(String outputType)
        Deprecated. user #getViewIdentifier(String) instead
        Get the tile to be used for rendering
        Parameters:
        outputType - the output type (rss, dhtml ...) without any '.'
        Returns:
        The tile to show

      • getViewIdentifier

        String getViewIdentifier()
        Get the view identifier which defines the view for rendering the widgets content
        Returns:
        The tile to show
